mapper.select: select count(*) from contents ctt inner join video vd on vd.cono = ctt.cono inner join copic cp on ctt.cono = cp.cono inner join topic tp on cp.tno = tp.tno inner join snatr snt on tp.tno = snt.tno inner join result ret on snt.reno = ret.reno inner join mentee mte on ret.sno = mte.sno inner join lklst lk on ctt.cono = lk.cono where lk.sno = #{sno};

select * from video vd inner join contents ctt on vd.cono = ctt.cono inner join copic cp on ctt.cono = cp.cono inner join topic tp on cp.tno = tp.tno inner join snatr snt on tp.tno = snt.tno inner join result ret on snt.reno = ret.reno inner join mentee mte on ret.sno = mte.sno inner join lklst lk on ctt.cono = lk.cono where lk.sno = #{sno} limit #{startRowIndex}, #{rowSize}
